interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2018/09/15
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Steven Spielberg'], 'Producers': ['Richard D. Zanuck', 'David Brown'], 'Starring': ['Roy Scheider', 'Robert Shaw', 'Richard Dreyfuss'], 'Studio': ['UNIVERSAL PAY TELEVISION']}
Review Text: Picked this up to watch to christen our new pool and movie night on the big screen.  It was almost nostalagic watching the original Jaws again!  All I can say is pick it up and watch it again.
Review Title: Can't Go Wrong With A Classic
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
